text.tspan: This is a mockumentary project. We tried to tell a horror story by
using the blog form. We created a fake blog which belongs to a
cyber celebrity. Through her recording of her daily life, readers of
this blog will find some supernatural stuffs happened on this girl.
We used the live comment so the readers can see how “former
readers” of this blog reacted to those weird things in a live way.
(Can only be accessed via NYU net with Safari)
